titleStmt.title: Abel being dead yet speaketh; or, The life & death of that deservedly famous man of God, Mr John Cotton, late teacher of the church of Christ, at Boston in New-England. By John Norton, teacher of the same church.
titleStmt.author: Norton, John, 1606-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Newcomb for Lodowick Lloyd, and are to be sold at his shop next the Castle-tavern in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The life of Mr John Cotton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
